level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-168
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-168, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3701.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x) through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."

placeholder.heading: Testimony; production of books and records.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-168
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-168, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3701.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-168
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-168, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3701.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x) through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-168
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-168, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3701.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-209
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-209, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-3701.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: Section 601(b) of D.C. Law 6-209 provided that title III and sections 401, 402, 404, 405 and 406 of the act shall take effect on October 1, 1987.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000."
